alert.note: Alert for Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Santa Rosa County through 545 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm near Point Baker, or 4 miles northwest of Milton. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pace, Milton, Floridatown, Point Baker and Pea Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
